Package net.sf.iptablesJava.rules

Provide an interface for generation, parsing and application of iptables rules.

Package net.sf.iptablesJava.rules Description

Provide an interface for generation, parsing and application of iptables rules.
The IPTables class is the interface for communication with the netfilter firewall through the iptables command.
The RuleSet class is used to represent the rules, it can be build also by parsing the iptables exported rules (with iptables-save command).
